'''Outrider's Champion Steak!''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Steak]] with [[Amber]]. The [[recipe]] for Steak is available from the start of the game.

Outrider's Champion Steak! revives a character and restores '''10'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''150''' HP  to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
